Title: V-neck Cap Sleeves Evening Dress

Featured-image: C36-nude-black-v-neck-cap-sleeves-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A chiffon gown is adorned with beading and sequins. The details cascade into the center of the bust to the top of the skirt. The capped sleeves are embellished with the same beading. There is a sheer panel on the plunge of the bust. The sheer back is treated with the same beading design. Stunning and classical.
